enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: This section is currently closed to registration.  Please contact the department directly with any questions.
title: JOUR JOUR 401-0-20 Ethics & Law of Journalism

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Overview of ethical and legal issues affecting journalism. Issues address a broad range of circumstances, including relationships with sources, journalistic practices. Course also covers the basics of constitutions, statutes, rules and regulations, major court cases concerning journalism. Class references questions arising from citizen journalism and other digital publishing phenomena.

subject: JOUR
